title: Brands
copy: Creating a brand is creating an experience. Users don’t remember the logo. They remember the feeling. overnice makes sure it’s a nice one.
smallCopy: Brands just like friends, corporate design, messaging.

casePreviews.copy: A radical, inclusive and concept-driven approach to branding one of the most thrilling technologies in existence: Nimiq, a browser-based cryptocurrency.
Automation killing jobs is a scary topic; ironically, an AI-based service overnice branded and dubbed Peers could be the solution. The branding required tact.
A dual brand strategy that leverages interaction and synergy to create more than the sum of its parts for Archilyse, architecture analysis by machine learning.
Prisma simplifies database management and as a typical start-up, everything changes all the time. How branding can evolve without losing identity.

title: Products
copy: An excellent digital product has texture, fragrance, and moves to a steady beat. overnice takes the users by the hand and makes them all comfy, just to rattle their cages where it matters.
smallCopy: Web- and mobile apps, platforms, websites.

casePreviews.copy: Breaking barriers, translating complicated stuff and stripping away technicalities until it’s easier to create a Nimiq account on the blockchain than creating an email address.
Losing your internet connection is bad, providing costly support call centers is too. overnice helped Vodafone, and it’s customers with a smart and individualized self-service solution.
Talentwunder finds talent. overnice helped with the search. Aggregating a tiring and incomprehensible list of input fields into a single, smart search field.
Kocks is a classic, family-owned German engineering company. Their AAA steel products now come with an AAA web-presence – custom CMS included.
The Berlin-based coffee chain Einstein prides itself with its roastery and high-quality coffees. The new website mirrors their passion and finds the coffee that suits you best.

title: Creatives
copy: overnice develops communication strategies and measures that seem like somebody spontaneously said the right thing, in the right place, at the right time.
smallCopy: Persuasive marketing strategies, creative direction, crafty execution

casePreviews.copy: Securing Ethereum Smart Contracts is as crucial as it is complicated. overnice developed a set of items from company videos to infographics for Solidified.
How fast can I kick a ball? How good is the new Nike Superfly XY really? overnice created an in-store experience that answers both questions while creating some nice content for your Instagram.
How to promote Nimiq at a no logo/no sponsor conference? With a huge floating banner, weatherproof marketeers and a designated onboarding app obviously.
Scammers riddle the blockchain space. Besides individuals, it’s companies that exploit the young technology. overnice exposed a particularly bad one and created awareness for Alethena.
